landing.sub-title: The first sports data collection tool in real time

area-2.title: Operate on sports data
area-2.content: Qaobee accompanies you in the collection and analysis of sports data.

item-0.title: Free download
item-0.content: Available in the App Store and Google Play, Qaobee is the ideal solution for the management of sports data. It works on both phones and tablets, in training and competition.

item-1.title: Data management
item-1.content: Qaobee converts sports data into strategic informations and integrates easily with your business to simplify your life.

item-2.title: Workspace
item-2.content: Personalized dashboard, effective management, sporting calendar, reports and analysis meetings, Qaobee takes care of everything to enable you to focus on the essential: the performance of your group.

item-3.title: Automatic updates
item-3.content: The proposed regular free updates give you the most convenient features to optimize the management of your team.

area-4.title: Soon available.
area-4.content: Qaobee will be downloaded from the App Store and Google Play.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.title2: Do not hesitate to contact us
